text_block_list.text: On a certain day, as I was out shopping near the train station, I happened to spot a horse girl on my way back to school.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Whew… Ok that's enough of a break.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: I've got to get back quickly so that I can get started on my next training.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: You can do it Rice. Go Rice… Go!!!
With a spring in her step, Rice Shower took off running. Because of her small stature, she seemed to radiate an aura that drew my attention.
For some reason, I felt as if she was someone that could accomplish anything. As we were both heading back to the campus, I decided to go the same route.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Phew…
But then she was stopped by a red light…

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Haaaah…
And then she was stopped by another red light…

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Ugh!!!
As if some mysterious force was at play, she was once again stopped by a red light. Maybe today was just not a good day…
Afterward we were stopped by red light after red light, by the time we finally reached the campus, the sun had long set.
And then…

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: E… excuse me!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Yes! I, I'm…

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: I'm so sorry!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: That's… because I was running near you, you ended up arriving this late to the campus…

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: I'm really really sorry!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: No, it really is my fault. I'm always causing misfortune for others. Because I… I'm useless…!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: I'm so sorry. But everything will be ok if I'm not here! If you'll excuse me!
Saying her piece, Rice Shower ended up running away. If I left everything after all that it would've been too depressing.
choice_data_list: (Let's not think too hard about it and go after her!)

text_block_list.text: I immediately went after her.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Huh… huh… huh… haah…

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: The person from before, I wonder if he'll be alright after being so late.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: What if he ended up becoming hungry? Or if he ended up missing a show he wanted to watch because he was so late?

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: (Sigh) I really am such a useless girl…
It looked as if she had a lot on her mind. However, as I was about to call out to her…

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: But even still I have to do my best!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Because the Selection Race is already decided, I have to make sure to compete, run properly, and then…

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: I'll debut, compete in a lot of races, and then I'll no longer be just a useless girl.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: So I have to train. You can do it Rice. Go Rice…

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Go!!!
And so Rice Shower desperately continued her harsh training. Silently I left the area, never managing to call out to her…
I can't wait to see her run seriously during the upcoming Selection Race.
As expectations continued to rise, the day of the Selection Race finally arrived. Trainers filled the race stands, looking to scout any horse girls that caught their eyes.
But…

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Rice-san! Rice-san, Rice-san, Rice-san!? Where are you!!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: I, the class representative, have dashed all the way over here to inform you that your race is just about to start!

text_block_list.name: Selection Race Official A
text_block_list.text: Speaking of which Sakura Bakushin O-san, your group is also the next to depart, so please hurry and make your preparations for the race!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Oh no!

text_block_list.name: Veteran Trainer A
text_block_list.text: It looks like Rice Shower is boycotting the Selection Race. It's a shame since she had some good racing qualities.

text_block_list.name: Average Trainer A
text_block_list.text: Racing qualities aside, it's a problem if she isn't showing up to her races.
In the end, I wasn't able to see Rice Shower run at the Selection Race.
However I would soon see Rice Shower later again that night.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: [Crying]

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Stupid! Stupid! Stupid! I'm so stupid! Even though I worked so hard, even though I decided to work hard…

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: [Sniff] Why? Why do I have to be such a useless girl…?
Watching her cry and being in so much pain, before I even realize it, I had already made my way towards her.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Huh!?

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: You're… the person from before?
